short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lookup definitions, pronunciations, audio of words on any webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It gets the input of a word from the user and looks up its definition, pronunciation text, and audio on any web page. it also allows copying the definition to the clipboard using the icon.
